p.7: =E2=80=A2 A degree in Business Administration, Computer Science, Computer Technology, Computer Programming & Software Development, Statistics, Mathematics, Engineering or certificate of completion of a coding boot-camp and 2-3 years of experience
p.8: =E2=80=A2 Demonstrated knowledge of digital skills. Knowledge of and experience using Microsoft Power BI/ Tableau, SQL, ETL Tools
p.9: =E2=80=A2 Excellent verbal and written communication skills, with the ability to effectively tailor technical concepts for less technical audiences

strong: Explain the function(s) to be performed by the requested staff member:

p.14: =E2=80=A2 Collaborates with team members and/or data systems to collect data
p.15: =E2=80=A2 Evaluates sources of information to determine any limitations, in terms of reliability or usability
p.16: =E2=80=A2 Cleans, manipulates and analyzes large sets of raw data
p.17: =E2=80=A2 Knowledge of at least one of the following: SQL, Python, R and/or other programming languages
p.18: =E2=80=A2 Builds data models, and checks for inaccuracies, and creates and maintains record of transactions in tools
p.19: =E2=80=A2 Knowledge of data visualization software like Microsoft Power BI and/or Tableau Blueprint
p.20: =E2=80=A2 Knowledge of automated tools such as Microsoft Power Automate or Power Tools to extract data and/or Extract, Transform, Load (ETL) tools
p.21: =E2=80=A2 Creates reports and dashboards and/or other visualizations to convey results
p.22: =E2=80=A2 Recommends data-driven solutions to key stakeholders
p.23: =E2=80=A2 Establishes KPIs to measure effectiveness of business decisions and/or management dashboards
p.24: =E2=80=A2 Creates presentations and reports based on recommendations and findings
p.25: =E2=80=A2 Conducts business analysis and research to identify key metrics and opportunities for improvement
p.26: =E2=80=A2 Provides end user training, documentation and support on process and metrics used
p.27: =E2=80=A2 Leads team of data analysts, directing and providing guidance on day-to-day tasks
p.28: =E2=80=A2 Coaches analysts on team and encourages learning and development
p.29: =E2=80=A2 Knowledge of Data Warehouses, and Data Lakes and/or other data storage locations
